title: Kanojo ga Flag wo Oraretara (If Her Flag Breaks)
synopsis: In visual novels, an imaginary flag is defined as an event that serves as a turning point for the whole story. A player triggering the romance flag for a heroine will proceed to her route, or a death flag will signify that a certain character will die afterwards.
related_anime: ['Kanojo ga Flag wo Oraretara: Christmas? Sonna Mono ga Boku ni Tsuuyou Suru to Omou no ka?', 'Kanojo ga Flag wo Oraretara']
